    • Method Detail

      • addToHistory

        public void addToHistory()
        Description copied from class: Movable
        Adds the current sprite to the history stack. If the stored positions goes over the MAX_STACK_SIZE, removes from history. For flexibility, change Constant.MAX_STACK_SIZE for a different number of max undos.
        Overrides:
        addToHistory in class Movable

      • push

        public void push(int dir)
        Description copied from class: Pushable
        The object is being pushed by a sprite that can_push blocks
        Overrides:
        push in class Pushable
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction the Sprite is being pushed in

      • update

        public void update(int delta)
        If the ice has been pushed, move in that direction once every ICE_MOVE_TIME ms until it hits a blocked object and comes to a stop, resetting time and direction.
        Overrides:
        update in class Sprite
